body_html:
I do have GPU and I want to use it.

On Tue, Nov 17, 2015 at 6:46 PM, Vijay Vasudevan notifications@github.com
wrote:

Do you have a GPU in your machine that you want to use?

If not:

  1. consider using the CPU binary, not the GPU binary
  2. you should be able to ignore these warnings. they are helpful for
    debugging for those who do want to use GPUs.

—
Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
#255 (comment)
.
